EmailTemplate.description: When an article of type Bank Info is created this template is sent to the community users of Start Up Community
EmailTemplate.name: Article Economic Forecast
EmailTemplate.subject: Annual economic forecast on commodity pricing
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Commnuity User,
Annual Digital Bank economic forecast on commodity pricing is now available on the community. Please, click the link below to access it: https://fcscommunity-developer-edition.na40.force.com/StartUP/s/article/ka146000000lA4TAAU/Economic-Forecast-4
Thanks, {!Organization.Name}
Visit our website
Digital Bank is an initiative by Deloitte Digital
